entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as saying 'An' anyway , yeh couldn’ work any of them curses yet, yeh’ll need a lot more study before yeh get ter that level.'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character. He is mentioned as buying a set of scales and examining silver unicorn horns at twenty-one Galleons each.

entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: A cauldron is a cooking pot used for brewing potions. Hagrid wouldn’t let Harry buy a solid gold cauldron.

relationships.description: Hagrid advises Harry on potion-making, saying 'An' anyway , yeh couldn’ work any of them curses yet, yeh’ll need a lot more study before yeh get ter that level.'
Hagrid forbids Harry from buying a solid gold cauldron.
Harry visits the apothecary’s with Hagrid.
